modName: Tutorial Adding Transparency to clothes or armor
summary: This tutorial will teach you how to make simple modifications to the appearance of clothes or armor, by making parts of it transparent, and thus invisible. It is not targeted at experienced modders, but rather at those who have little to no experience but do know how to install mods.
descriptionHtml:
Reason for this ‘tutorial’ is that I had some requests for explaining how to apply transparency to clothes or armor. And as I don’t know of any existing tutorial describing exactly that in a clear way, with the detail required for beginners, I thought I may as well share what I figured out myself and save others some work.

This tutorial will teach you how to make simple modifications to the appearance of clothes or armor, by making parts of it transparent, and thus invisible. It is not targeted at experienced modders, but rather at those who have little to no experience but do know how to install mods. 

The tools that I have used are NifSkope 1.1.0-RC6 and GIMP 2.8.0. 
Experience with these tools is not required, as the limited use of those will be sufficiently explained.

Credit -  to the creators of the mods that I use in the tutorial:
Dimon99 for his great female body UNP mod
KURESE for his R18Pn Set - Inner Wear Set

And RIP88 for feedback and suggestions for additional information
author: slbrgt
